messages.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: Please compare the growth trajectory of the leading global e-commerce platforms by compiling their quarterly performance for 2024—Amazon, eBay, Shopee (Sea), Alibaba. Use figures from official financial reports for publicly traded companies; for privately held firms, cite reputable news sources and mark relevant numbers with an asterisk (*) to denote that they are estimates. For information you can't find online, just fill in with "-". 

Present the data in one Markdown table with the columns (in this order): Company, Quarter, GMV (USD bn), Revenue (USD bn), Net Profit (USD bn).

For Quarters,  label it simply Q1, Q2, etc.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the column without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To compile the quarterly performance data for Amazon, eBay, Shopee (Sea), and Alibaba for 2024, I will need to gather the most recent available quarterly financial data or news estimates where necessary.

<search>Quarterly performance of Amazon, eBay, Shopee (Sea), Alibaba in 2024</search>

Search query: Quarterly performance of Amazon, eBay, Shopee (Sea), Alibaba in 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.statista.com/statistics/1534944/sea-e-commerce-gmv-by-platform/?srsltid=AfmBOoq2V1_OQ9NAfnE1G3TAc9VkyyDZdddLGoto6aZ48UeF0mmPEpwc):
E-commerce GMV SEA 2024, by platform - Statista In 2024, the e-commerce gross merchandise value of Shopee amounted to **** billion US dollars. This was followed by TikTok Shop with **** billion US dollars.

Amazon, Alibaba and eBay: 2013-2024 Revenue. - Kaggle Quarterly Performance: Consistent relative performance of each quarter, with Q4 standing out. Alibaba. Founding and Early Days. Founded: April 4, 1999; Founder ...

[Doc 3](https://www.shipaid.com/blogs/news/e-commerce-q2-2024-earnings-key-insights-and-trends):
E-commerce Q2 2024 Earnings: Key Insights and Trends - SHIPAID eBay: Performance: eBay reported a modest 2% increase in revenue for Q1 2024, totaling $2.56 billion. Gross merchandise volume (GMV) remained flat​ (Digital ...

Based on the credible sources:

Search query: Quarterly revenue of Amazon, eBay, Shopee (Sea), Alibaba for Q1-Q3 2024
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/patricklford/amazon-alibaba-and-ebay-2013-2023):
Amazon, Alibaba and eBay: 2013-2024 Revenue. - Kaggle Amazon, Alibaba and eBay: 2013-2024 Revenue. The Ups and Downs of E-commerce, with Sales Predictions for 2024-2034.

[Doc 2](https://ir.aboutamazon.com/news-release/news-release-details/2025/Amazon-com-Announces-Third-Quarter-Results/):
Amazon.com Announces Third Quarter Results Net sales increased 13% to $180.2 billion in the third quarter, compared with $158.9 billion in third quarter 2024. · Operating income was $17.4 ...

Amazon sales reach second-highest total to date in Q3 Amazon sales surpassed $180 billion in a single quarter for the second time in its fiscal Q3 2025, as continued investing in generative AI.
